title: Population factors that indicate quality of life

content.question: What two main factors would best indicate the quality of life of a countryâ€™s population?

choices.label: The total fertility rate and the death rate
The crude birth rate and crude death rate
The birth rate and the infant mortality rate
The replacement-level fertility rate and the total fertility rate
The life expectancy and the infant mortality rate

content.answer: The life expectancy and the infant mortality rate
